```{r}
### get confidence table
library(tidyverse)
confidence_table = read.csv(file = './input_files/TGD_bestorthos.txt', header = 1, sep = '\t')
confidence_table_95 = filter(confidence_table, BESTPROB >= 0.95 & gasterosteus_aculeatus1 != 'None' )

confidence_table = na_if(confidence_table, "NONE")
IGC1 = filter(confidence_table,
               rowSums(is.na(confidence_table[,c(7,8,15,16)])) == 0 
               & rowSums(is.na(confidence_table[,-c(7,8,15,16)])) ==0 
               & BESTPROB >= 0.95)
IGC2 = filter(confidence_table,
               rowSums(is.na(confidence_table[,c(7,8,15,16)])) == 0 
               #& rowSums(is.na(confidence_table[,-c(7,8,15,16)])) ==0 
               & BESTPROB >= 0.95)

print(dim(IGC1)[1]); print(dim(IGC2)[1])
intersect(str_c('Pillar',IGC2$SITE,'R'), rownames(IGC2_Original))
```
